1.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, Phoebe, Rachel, Chandler, and Monica are there. Rachel is reading
everyone’s horoscope.

lines.Line:
And your horoscope says, "On the fifth a special someone is going
to give you a gift.
(To Monica) Oh, well thank you in advance. (Kisses her.
Op, but the twelfth brings a lover’s spat
Op, but the twelfth brings a lover’s spat

(To Chandler) You are going to make a joke about my special
present! Why would you do that?
Oh, wait and on the nineteenth a secret crush announces itself

lines.Character: (Phoebe winks and licks her lips while eyeing Chandler
lines.Line: Phoebe winks and licks her lips while eyeing Chandler.

lines.Character: (Phoebe winks and licks her lips while eyeing Chandler
lines.Line: Phoebe winks and licks her lips while eyeing Chandler.

(ecstatic) Oh my God! It’s Joey Tribbiani of Mac and
C.H.E.E.S.E.!!!!!!

lines.Character: (Everyone claps and cheers, Joey mimics looking about with a gun
lines.Line: Everyone claps and cheers, Joey mimics looking about with a gun.

Oh that’s right. It’s your first day! So are you psyched to
fight fake crime with your robot sidekick

Am I psyched? The lead in my own TV series? I’ve dreamed about this
for years! Why have I not been preparing?
No! Joey, you’re going to be great
No! Joey, you’re going to be great
No! Joey, you’re going to be great

But I got to act with a robot Pheebs, and-and I don’t know anything
about technology! I can’t even use Chandler’s computer except to find porn!
And-and that’s only ‘cause it’s right there when you turn it on
I think our lover’s spat will start a little early this month
(in a sexy voice to Chandler) I’ll be waiting
(in a sexy voice to Chandler) I’ll be waiting

2.SceneDescription:
Pier 59 Studios, it’s the set of Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E. The producer is
showing Joey around the set.

lines.Line:
(walking into Mac’s office) So uh, here’s your office
set
Wow! Huh? (Picks up the phone) Mac Macaveli, Private Investigator

(checking his watch) Let’s get you into wardrobe for a
fitting
Okay. Hey uh, when do I get to meet the robot
Okay. Hey uh, when do I get to meet the robot

I’m sorry, why don’t we do that right now? He’s
right here. (Points to a guy.

Oh wow! He’s so lifelike! (Starts touching the guy’s cheeks)
Unbelievable! (He starts tugging on the guy’s ears
This is Wayne, the man who created and operates C.H.E.E.S.E
(slaps Wayne on his cheek) How do you do there, Wayne? (Backs away.
(slaps Wayne on his cheek) How do you do there, Wayne? (Backs away.
I’ll let you two guys get acquainted, huh? (Walks away.

Okay. Sorry about that…(Mimics that cheek thing he just did.) Uh, so
where’s C.H.E.E.S.E.
(Wayne with a computerized voice) Nice to meet you Mac
(Wayne with a computerized voice) Nice to meet you Mac
(laughs) This is like the temporary robot, right

Well, I-I just, I just it was going to be like a really cool robot,
y’know? Like the terminator or uh, when I first saw you

I spent two years developing this machine, it’s absolutely state of
the art

I’m sorry, it just—I don’t know it doesn’t really look
like it can do anything

It can do this. (He moves C.H.E.E.S.E.’s arm close to Joey’s
special area and he jumps back.

3.SceneDescription:
Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Phoebe is working on her book at the kitchen
table, Monica is on the couch, and Chandler is entering from the bathroom carrying a
package of toilet paper.

lines.Line:
Hey honey, you got the kind with the little girl, you said we were
gonna to get the kind with the baby
No, you said the baby creeps you out
No, the little girl creeps me out
No, the little girl creeps me out
Why would the baby creep me out
Why would the baby creep me out
Why would the little girl creep you out

(writing frantically) You guys, I’m sorry, could you please talk a
little slower?
This is going in your book
This is going in your book

Yeah, it’s about relationships. Y’know? The traps, the
pitfalls, what not to do, keep going. This stuff is great

And how none of it matters when the people really love each other.
(Chandler and Monica kiss.) And how people will believe anything you tell them as long as
it’s a compliment

4.SceneDescription:
Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Phoebe is still writing in her book, Chandler
and Monica are in the kitchen as Joey enters.

lines.Line: Pretty great! Except I did get a little attitude from the robot

Damn those robots, they’re supposed to be our faithful
servants

Anyway, it wasn’t the robot, it was the guy who controls him. Yeah,
he doesn’t like me. He had C.H.E.E.S.E. knock over the sandwich right when I was
reaching for one! Ohh
Well, why don’t you just get him fired
Well, why don’t you just get him fired
Well, why don’t you just get him fired

I may have to, I hate to do it, but I’m the star! Y’know?
There’s a limit to how many sandwiches I can eat off the floor. (His cell phone
rings) Excuse me. (Answers it, on phone) Joey Tribbiani.

(on the other end) Joe! I’m glad I found ya, I got an audition for
ya

The thing is it’s kinda on the Q.T. The actor who has the part
doesn’t know he might be fired. It’s the lead in a series, Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E
I’m the lead in Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.!
I’m the lead in Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.!

5.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, scene is continued from earlier.

lines.Line: Joey?! Joey!! (He runs into his bedroom.
Okay, I’ll just wait for him in here
Okay, I’ll just wait for him in here
Ross, it’s okay. You can come out
Yeah Ross it’s okay, it’s me, Mr. Stevens
(coming out of the bedroom) Oh! Oh my God! I didn’t even see you

Sure you did! You came in, you got all awkward, and you ran into the
bedroom. You were shouting, "Joey! Joey!" Bye Rach. (Kisses her.
I’ll call you later. Bye Ross. (Leaves
What-what-what the—how da-how did-what the-how did-what?
Well, y’know he lost his keys so he was looking for them

No! Downstairs! And we got to talking y’know, for like two hours,
and I really liked him so I invited him up here for a cup of coffee
Ross, what’s the big deal? So I kissed the guy

He is my girlfriend’s father, okay? It’s-it’s, it’s
weird

Ross look, look this is good for you. Okay? Let’s face it, so far
the guy’s not lovin’ ya! But I can turn that around! I got the inside track! We
can all go out to dinner, y’know? And I can talk you up! Ross, the guy is a very, very
successful lawyer

6.SceneDescription: Pier 59 Studios, Joey is walking up to C.H.E.E.S.E. and Wayne.

lines.Line:
Morning! Hey, how’s my favorite genius and my little robot buddy?!
(Pats C.H.E.E.S.E. on the head.

Okay! (He yanks his hand away.) All right. Umm, all right Wayne, level
with me. Okay? I-I keep hearing all these rumors that I might get fired. Okay, they even
have actors coming in to read for my part! Come on man, you-you got to give me a second
chance! I mean, I love-I love this little guy! (He grabs C.H.E.E.S.E.’s arm and pulls
it off at the elbow.) Ah-ah!! (Wayne is shocked.) Okay, that’s why you didn’t
want me to touch him right? Here you go! Okay? (Hands Wayne the arm and he goes to fix it.
Meanwhile Joey starts to berate himself.) Stupid! I can’t believe it! God! (A very
beautiful woman walks by.) (To her) Hey, how you doin’? (He and her go over to talk
and Wayne looks on with envy.

7.SceneDescription:
Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Monica and Chandler are entering and
they’re arguing.

lines.Line: Chandler, we said we would meet at the coffeehouse at six

The only way that I said six would be if the seven’s, let meet at
seven, not at six

Yeah and if I had seven, maybe I would’ve said something like this,
"Wow! My boyfriend’s such a wise ass—seven!
I know what time you said
Well actually, I know what time Chester and Marcia said

Quite an interesting turn of events, suddenly it’s my book to the
rescue, huh? (Reading her book) Ooh, very interesting. Yeah, well this certainly clears
things up
I will tell you as soon as you thank me for writing my book

Thank you for writing your book. Its-its uh, great book and you are
the queen of everything

(To Monica) I told you I should not wear this color. (He’s
wearing a reddish-orange sweater.

(reading from her book) Mon… (Pause as she restarts) Marcia and
Chester are planning on seeing a movie on Sunday night. Marcia thinks they’re
supposed to meet at six, Chester thinks it’s at seven
So you knew we were gonna miss the movie
So you knew we were gonna miss the movie
Inside of telling us you decided to write in your stupid book
(writing in her book) Marcia and Chester are mad at Phyllis

8.SceneDescription: A Restaurant, Rachel is still trying to talk up Ross, not to much success.

lines.Line:
I mean if you think about it, I mean Ross did learn something from each
marriage
How to make the next one even shorter

Now wait a minute that’s not fair. He was married to me a hell of a
lot longer than he was married to Emily, he just didn’t tell me. (Everyone looks at
her, Ross not happily.) Maybe I have to pee again. (Gets up to try to use the bathroom.
Well, this is fun. So Ross, did you kill any of these wives
Well, this is fun. So Ross, did you kill any of these wives

Y’know what? I-I-I… I-I have had enough of this! Y’know,
I-I-I care a great deal about your daughter and I have treated her with nothing but
respect! So if-if you’ve got a problem with me, frankly

Y’know what daddy? If you don’t like Ross, that’s
fine. It doesn’t matter to me, I’m gonna go out with him anyway

Well if it doesn’t matter to her, it doesn’t matter to me! (to
Paul) Still not yelling

Wow. What can I say? (Pause, pointing at Ross) This doesn’t make me
like you any better
That’s okay, I’m not so crazy about myself right now either
Uh yeah, I guess—Yeah! I guess so

(returning) Wait-wait-wait, I just thought of another story about how
nice Ross is
That’s okay Rach, we’re not liking Ross right now
Oh! I’ve got a lot of those too
Oh! I’ve got a lot of those too
